divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: This happend in september of 96,I know its been a while but I thought you would like to know ,I was coming back north on us 27 in lakeplacid this ball of light came up over a state trooper station right at me then backed up and stayed right along side of me on the side of the south bound lanesit stayed with me for about 3 miles then it took off I could still see it it went so far away and came back in my guess about 5 seconds then it was only about 2 miles from me it was shooting red and blue beems of light to the ground then it drifed away ,when it was along side of me it was so bright but did not lumanate anything and had tear drop shaped lights swirling all around inside the white light they were rainbow colored ,It was about the size of two full size vans ,and there was no noise,it looked like it was pulling in energy and the lights inside were gathering up what ever it was pulling in thats my theory any way,the distance between us was about 75 to 100 ft.I wish I had a camera that night and all the other times thank you .
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Sebring
There were no other sightings in Sebring on or around April 13th 2005
